actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.

official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study of water resources in the State of New Mexico.
short_title: New Mexico Aquifer Assessment Act of 2009

summary.text: New Mexico Aquifer Assessment Act of 2009 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Director of the United States Geological Survey (USGS), to conduct a study of water resources in New Mexico, to include: (1) a survey of groundwater resources and a characterization of surface and bedrock geology; and (2) the Estancia Basin, Salt Basin, Tularosa Basin, Hueco Basin, and middle Rio Grande Basin.

titles.title: New Mexico Aquifer Assessment Act of 2009
To direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study of water resources in the State of New Mexico.
